net.viktorc.pspp.core

Class PSPPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.viktorc.pspp.core.PSPPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PSPPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A class for maintaining a pool of identical running processes.
    Author:
    A6714

    • Constructor Summary

      PSPPool(java.lang.String processCommand, ProcessListener listener, int poolSize)
      Constructs a pool of the specified number of identical processes started by the specified command.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PSPPool

        public PSPPool(java.lang.String processCommand,
               ProcessListener listener,
               int poolSize)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a pool of the specified number of identical processes started by the specified command. The number of pooled process is kept constant, meaning if a process dies, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        processCommand - The command for starting the processes.
        listener - The process listener instance.
        poolSize - The number of processes to maintain in the pool.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the process command is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(java.lang.String command,
                           CommandListener commandListener)
        Executes the command on any of the available processes in the pool.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to send to the process' standard in.
        commandListener - The #CommandListener instance that possibly processes the outputs of the process and determines when the process has finished processing the sent command.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
